name: Natural Skeptic
description: On recruiting Follower immediately lose 10 Faith.

name: Naturally Obedient
description: On recruiting this Follower immediately gain 10 Faith.

name: Belief in Afterlife
description: Death is not the end. When a Follower dies only lose -5 faith instead of -20.

name: Terrified of Death
description: Lose -5 Faith whenever another Follower dies.

name: Cannibal
description: +5 Faith and no chance of sickness when eating Minced Follower Meat. No faith lost when Followers saw you butchered corpses.

name: Grass Eater
description: No negative Faith when a Follower eats Grassy Gruel, and no chance of sickness.

name: Belief in Original Sin
description: -2 Faith instead of -15 when putting a Follower in Prison who is not dissenting.

name: Belief in Absolution
description: Every day that begins without anyone in prison, gain +10 Faith.

name: Belief in Sacrifice
description: +20 Faith when Sacrifice of the Flesh is performed. Followers when ascended drop Bone and Follower Meat.

name: Against Sacrifice
description: -5 Faith when a Follower is Sacrificed.

name: Faithful
description: Generates Devotion 15% faster. Mutually exclusive with Faithless.

name: Faithless
description: Generates Devotion 15% slower.

name: Fear of the Sick
description: -5 Faith when another Cult member becomes sick.

name: Believes Illness is Divine Punishment
description: Gain 5 Faith when another Cult member becomes ill. Note: Max 1

name: Sickly
description: Heals 15% slower when sick and in bed rest.

name: Strong Constitution
description: Heals 15% faster when sick and in bed rest.

name: Zealous
description: Ignores dissenters when they preach.

name: Materialistic
description: Gain Faith when building better sleeping quarters.

name: False Idols
description: Gain +7 Faith instead of +4 when placing a decoration building.

name: Cynical
description: 15% harder to level up.

name: Gullible
description: Follower receives extra +15% from all Loyalty sources. Mutually exclusive with Cynical.

name: Germaphobe
description: Lose 10 Faith when falling ill.

name: Coprophiliac
description: Gain 10 Faith when falling ill. Won't vomit when seeing poop or vomit. Mutually exclusive with Germaphobe.

name: Industrious
description: Increase work speed by 15%.

name: Sloth
description: Work and devotion generation speed reduced by 10%.

name: Devotee
description: Gain +15 Faith instead of +10 when delivering a Sermon.

name: Sacral Architecture
description: When a new building is constructed, gain +5 Faith.

name: Substances Encouraged
description: Gain 20 Faith when Brainwashing Ritual is performed.

name: Prohibitionism
description: Increase work speed and devotion generation increased by 10% but 50% chance of Followers becoming sick after the Brainwashing Ritual.

name: Respect Your Elders
description: +5 Faith whenever Cult has an elder Follower.

name: Good Die Young
description: Gain +10 Faith if an Elder is sacrificed, murdered, or consumed, but lose -20 Faith if an Elder dies of old age.

name: Immortal
description: Will never reach old age.

name: Don't Starve
description: Will never starve.

name: Ex-Cult Leader
description: Raises the Loyalty of a nearby follower once per day.
restrictedReason: This trait is(?) currently unused and is still in the game files and can be added to a follower through save-editing. It has no icon.

name: Disciple
description: A member of the inner circle. Can re-educate Dissenters and use special Shrines.

name: Jerk
description: Likes to cause mischief.

name: Coward
description: Might run away if frightened.

name: Hot Tempered
description: May start a fight with other Followers.

name: Royal Pooper
description: All poops are golden.

name: Celibate
description: Not very...affectionate towards other Followers.

name: Lustful
description: Very...affectionate towards other Followers.

name: Fashionable
description: Generates Devotion 20% faster when wearing a unique outfit.

name: Doctrinal Extremist
description: Unlocks the ability to generate Sin from Confession Booth instead of Loyalty.

name: Violent Extremist
description: Sin has a chance to appear upon beating mini-bosses. Mini-bosses from the Purgatory do not grant Sin.

name: Born of Sin
description: One Sin is automatically extracted from Followers hatched in the cult.

name: Blind Allegiance
description: Followers hatched in the cult with be born with a high Loyalty level.

name: Hedonist
description: Decreases productivity by 10% but increases Sin generation by 15%.

name: Ascetic
description: Decreases Sin generation by 10% but increases productivity by 15%.

name: Virtuous
description: Produces Sin 20% slower. Mutually exclusive with Unrepentant.

name: Unrepentant
description: Produces Sin 15% faster.

name: Snorer
description: Followers with the Snorer trait wake up followers who are sleeping nearby by snoring loudly at night.

name: Unlawful
description: Has a small chance each phase to break out of prison, and can even break other followers out of prison.

name: Night Owl
description: Sleeps during the day and works at night.

name: Poet
description: Never work and have no interactions; they will sit near the edge of the base, writing poetry all day.

name: Scarred Criminal
description: (Acts similarly to Coward trait).
restrictedReason: After being released from the Prison, the follower may gain this temporary trait.

name: Reformed Criminal
description: Raises productivity by 10%.
restrictedReason: After being released from the Prison, the follower may gain this temporary trait.

name: Hardened Criminal
description: (Acts similarly to Jerk trait).
restrictedReason: After being released from the Prison, the follower may gain this temporary trait.

name: Inspired by Mission
description: Only positive conversations with other followers.
restrictedReason: After returning alive from a Missionary, the follower may gain this temporary trait.

name: Excited by Mission
description: Has a 20% higher chance to be successful in Mating Tent.
restrictedReason: After returning alive from a Missionary, the follower may gain this temporary trait.

name: Disturbed by Mission
description: Followers with this trait will behave the same way as Catatonic followers.
restrictedReason: After returning alive from a Missionary, the follower may gain this temporary trait.

name: Pettable
description: Can be pet regardless of the follower's form.

name: Happily Married
description: Productivity increased by 20%.

name: Unhappily Married
description: Decreases productivity by 20%.

name: Polyamorous
description: Never gets jealous of other spouse from them; cannot get other wedding related traits upon getting married.

name: Spy
description: Followers may join the cult by themselves. Followers with this trait work and behave like any other followers and will leave the cult with 10% of gold after 5 days.

name: Bishop of [Cult Name]
description: Will not dissent against the lamb.
restrictedReason: This trait is exclusive to the ex-Bishops of Old Faith, which is hidden by default until you clear their corresponding quest fully.
